content: @Luis Maas @Julie Maas or anyone else from EMR Direct; Luis mentioned having an Issuer deployment. Is that deployment available for testing today? If so, can you provide details? (Totally ok if this is not available, I could have misunderstood during the introductions.)
EMR Direct posted details on their implementation on the Registration page under the System Role 1 section: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CAR/Track+Registration+SMART+Health+Card
